name: Melvin GREEN, Petitioner v. BUREAU OF COMMUNITY CORRECTIONS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Green v. Bureau of Community Corrections

parties: Melvin GREEN, Petitioner v. BUREAU OF COMMUNITY CORRECTIONS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of September, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
122 A.3d 1031
Melvin GREEN, Petitioner v. BUREAU OF COMMUNITY CORRECTIONS, Respondent.
No. 76 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 14, 2015.
